description: MainActivity class for an Android application managing navigation between different UI fragments such as EPG, VOD, Favorites, and Search. It handles user interactions, focus management, and fragment replacement logic.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: An Android activity class managing UI navigation and user input handling.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components, and assigns event listeners.

methods.name: openSearch
methods.description: Updates the UI to display the SearchFragment with the given query.

methods.name: navigateTo
methods.description: Navigates to a specified destination by replacing current fragment and updating the title.

methods.name: replaceContent
methods.description: Replaces the content container with the specified fragment.
